text: Big Turk is a brand of chocolate bar. They are chocolate bars that have been filled with magenta Turkish delight. Big Turk is owned by Nestlé. The chocolate bar was created by Kitchener, Ontario-company Smiles N’ Chuckles and it would be launched it in 1974. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1974 establishments Category:Chocolate bars Category:Nestlé
title: Big Turk
